--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill was shaken from the long state of thinking he was in. 
"What?"
> he said calmly, "Oh, Ironhide, yeah he is old. I'm sure he's still
> around, I saw him just a few months ago." Firedrill said 
thoughtfully.
> He turned and looked over the horizen, "What's taking Cliffjumper 
and
> Torca?" he asked, concern begining to be etched on his face.

::REDHOT::

    The seeker turned in the direction Cliffjumper and Torca had gone 
and he, too, become concerned.
    "It shouldn't take two Bots that long to check something 
out...unless of course something good's come up." He said that last 
bit with grim amusement and a wink.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
